replies.body:
Can I still burst squishies? Yes? Great, I can still do my job. No? Ripperoni.

edit: lul downvotes

Popular champions who are fun to play are universally hated by everyone but their players. Ahri falls under that category. The thing that separates her from say, Riven, is that Riven mains are more likely to be toxic. Other than that she falls under the fun-to-play mobile damage dealer classification. People only want iron walls slapping one another with wet noodles.
idk where the recent Ahri hate came from. Only been this bad this past month or two.
It's always annoying to see a character with super outsized win/playrates for an extended period of time. Remember Lux, and how it took literal years of outcry for her to see some reasonable nerfs?

She's been like this since 5.3. Legitimately two seasons. Lux outcry only really became relevant in S6 to where she was overly strong with TLD, and also became harder to kill due to some overarching changes to her W.
Lux outcry was relevant for like eight months straight. S6 had little to do with how legitimately busted she was.

It spikes every now and then but ahri hate is almost always relevant since she is pretty much always strong. I could go say ahri is stronger than a lot of champions who get nerfed and I'm right. Doesn't matter though because she isn't really as bs as some other things.

My only problem with ahri is that she is to forgiving. People say just dodge the charm. But if she ults in and misses her charm you dont get to punish her for that unless you are someone like ryze with a point and click cc because she will just ult away and even after her two ults if you catch up to her she still has flash.. That's my only problem with her.

Idk, I agreed that some champs/classes had too much dmg from masteries and stuff, but I dont like how I lose like ~5-7% of my damage on an assassin that already isnt that good. 
I hope there are at least finally gonna be some direct changes to {{champion:105}} sooon feelsbadman
uhg, please don't go asking for {{champion:105}}, easy killing and in good hands, impossible to even hit.
Damage in general is going down. Same with DPS.

Lower damage means damage that happens slower has more value. For example, if tanks live longer and ADCs don't die in 2 hits, ADCs gain value because their consistent damage is now needed to kill things. Same for Captain Teemo here. Teemo thrives in an environment where he doesn't get towerdove at level 1 and die instantly. He needs time to scale up from safety and deal DPS. This is why he is more viable in a tank meta than in a burst meta.

>How Is The Global Nerf To Damage Going To Affect You?

It's one step closer for me coming back to League after a year long hiatus.  It's not much, but it's more incentive than anything they've done since Juggernauts (pushing away.)

I mean, if they keep up on the damage nerfs, admit keystones were a failure, finally address mobility creep and actually do something about it, and we see 10 bans solidified in the client once it's finished, I may need to step back onto the Rift.  

The last time I was hopeful for Riot's direction, I got burned when they decided the spectator event was priority number one on their list of concerns, but I can't help but hope they're now realizing what a god-awful mess they've made and want to clean it up.

Eager to see what's next.

Eh, at worst, I notice Brand usually goes kill for kill in lane at 6. ~~Brand update was a mistake. 12+% maxhp that scales why. R prioritizing 3 passive stacks why. R innate slow why. R QoL changes why.~~

Also, please note in my example that I play Midlane Brand, not Support Brand. 

Support is the one role I refuse to play him in.
As was I, unfortunately.

Say what you will,  but his rework was a sucess imo.

He's unique, rewards skill in hitting all three spells, and provides the fantasies of being a fire elemental that blows up everything.

The things I listed just baffle me. He's fine for the most part, but the 12% scaling Max HP is there for no reason on top of his old %burn. The R prioritization is dumb as shit, I killed a Brand near his tower at 6 dodging all of his spells (except E) but he puts his R on me as minions come and it bounces between me and the minions all 4 times up to my own tower, procs his passive, and I almost die from 90% HP. I don't know why his R has an innate slow attached to it. And then the R changes so it retargets when its current target is no longer valid by Zhonya's, untargetability, or death.

He was fine before, but he got unnecessary buffs like Vel Koz did just so he'd see more play.

Well I wouldn't say unnecessary. 

These were real QoL changes for Brand so he'd be more viable. I imagine you haven't played Brand often enough to notice he had a lot of issues.

The max HP damage is so solidify him as the anti Tank mage.

If you notice his ratios are poor to make up for this.

All of his burst is tied up in his passive, and he struggles against mobile targets he can't hit.

Not to mention the range onhis E is so low he puts himself in danger to use it.

The took the RNG from his ult so he could be more reliable.
Most of you won't even notice the difference once it goes live.

With Riven, you have to think of her as a melee combo adc, she has mobility- but that's also her damage, if her shield is down, she's as vulnerable as any marksmen, she has low base armor and scaling so unless you have GA already then you basically get popped by anyone with any type of damage.

Except that with a standard Riven build, you have CC every 4 seconds, and Valor is a fair dash with a stupid large shield. Broken Wings can take you very far, and if you're worried about getting popped w/o your shield, you are definitely not using it for damage at that point, you are running away. I always laugh when Riven mains want their precious broken champ buffed, when they fail to realize that she has the lowest CD and some of the highest damage of any manaless champion. In addition, she uses a bug that Riot refuses to fix. If they fixed animation cancelling, then yeah, she could use a buff. But as long as Riven abuses a bug while already having stupid low CDs, you have no leg to stand on.
